text: Viva Las Vegas is a 1964 American musical film. It was directed by George Sidney and starring Elvis Presley and Ann-Margret. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1964 musical movies Category:1964 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies directed by George Sidney
title: Viva Las Vegas
